modelcheck 0.0.0.0

    Slab (ridge) plot for model predictions

    mc_model_slab.Rd

    Slab (ridge) plot for model predictions

    mc_obs_slab(...)

mc_model_slab(..., n_sample = NA, draw = "collapse")

    Arguments

    ...

    Augments passed to ggdist::stat_slab.

    n_sample

    The number of sample of draws to show in slab plot. Default NA. If n_sample is NA, then mc_model_slab() will use all draws from posterior distribution.

    draw

    How to show draws? Default "collapse". If draw is "collapse", then all draws are collapsed together to show in one slab plot; if draw is "group", then each draw is shown in an individual slab plot; if draw is "hops", then mc_model_slab() will use animation to show each draw in one frame; if draw is an function, then all draws are aggregated by draw(). See examples for more details.
